summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Card Vault application - Supabase integration working, frontend cyberpunk UI fully functional with 3D card animations

schema_issues.issue: Supabase table 'credit_card_transactions' requires additional fields (order_id) not provided by API
schema_issues.impact: Cannot create new cards via API
schema_issues.workaround: GET operations work perfectly for existing data

minor_warnings.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility

passed_tests: GET /api/cards - Returns 7 cards with all required fields
Dashboard displays correct total cards (7) and unique employees (5)
Card table shows properly masked numbers (last 4 digits only)
Ver Cart√£o button opens 3D card modal successfully
CVV display on card back working
Card click to flip functionality working
Mobile responsiveness - all features work on mobile viewport
No JavaScript errors or console errors found

success_percentage.backend: 75% (3/4 endpoints working - POST fails due to schema mismatch)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix POST /api/cards endpoint - Supabase table requires 'order_id' field that API doesn't provide. Either update API to include required fields or modify table schema to make fields optional.
